setNid

public void setNid(int nid)
Defines the task target node ID. If ID is 0 the target is all the available nodes in the network.

Parameters:
nid - Target node ID

getNid

public int getNid()
Returns the task target node ID. If ID is 0 the target is all the available nodes in the network.

setRepeat

public void setRepeat(int repeat)
Defines the amount of minutes in which the task will be repeating, if repeat is 0 there will be no repetitions.

Parameters:
repeat - Amount of minutes in which the task will be repeating

getRepeat

public int getRepeat()
Returns the amount of minutes in which the task will be repeating, if repeat is 0 there will be no repetitions.

Returns:
Amount of minutes in which the task will be repeating

setEvent

public void setEvent(int event)
Defines the event ID which must be detected in order to execute the task. If event is 0 the task will be executed without waiting for any event.

Parameters:
event - Event ID to wait

getEvent

public int getEvent()
Returns the event ID which must be detected in order to execute the task. If event is 0 the task will be executed without waiting for any event.

Returns:
Event ID to wait
